full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 Phone : 2910282 Christ Methodist Church 1, BUTLER ROAD, DELHI-110 054 REV. S.S. SINGH Ref No Pastor October 25,1988 Date TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN This is to certify that Mrs. Katherine Theodore W/O late Mr. Ramsey Theodore states that her date of birth is 11th August 1900, that she was borne at Ludhiana, Punjab. In the Indian Witness dated 11th December 1947 Mr. Theodore Abdul Razzaq of Delhi changed his name to Mr. Ramsey Theodore. Mr. Theodore wants it to be announced that his wife and children will be known by the following new names:- Mrs. Katherine Theodore instead of Kulsum Razzaq. Mrs. Katherine Theodore is well known to from over a period of three years. But she has been an active member of this church from over a period of forty years. She lives in Qourter NO. 3, Old Telegraph Qurters, Methodist Mission Compound Delhi-110054. Henrietta Samudre, maiden name Henrietta Theodore is her real daughter living in U.S.A. with her family. She wants to take her old aged mother with her as there is no one to look after her. I as the pastor of this church assure that the above information is true to the best of my knowledge. Stelligh S. S. .Singh Pastor Christ Methodist Church 1. Butler Road, Delhi-54
